title: Number of oncology practices in the U.S. by region and size 2013
summary: This statistic shows the U.S. of oncology practices U.S. by region size as of October 2013 , by Country .
During the survey , 31 % of respondents from the Northeast said that official oncology classifications or star ratings were 1-2 physicians U.S. by a oncology .
gold: This survey displays the number of oncology practices in the United States based on the number of physicians , by region , in 2013.
In that year , there were 24 oncology practices in the western part of the United States with only one or two physicians.
The size and demographic of medical professionals in oncology plays a significant role in the accessibility and quality of cancer care for patients in the United States .
